verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> a <S%H7613>rising,<s%> a <S%H5597>scab,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot,<s%> and it be in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> like the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy;<s%> then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> and when the <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in <S%H4758>sight<s%> be <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> it is a <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him, and pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and in <S%H4758>sight<s%> be not <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> thereof be not <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> up him that has the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%> be at a <S%H5975>stay,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> not in the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8145>more:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him <S%H8145>again<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H3544>somewhat<s%> <S%H3544>dark,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> not in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean:<s%> it is but a <S%H4556>scab:<s%> and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H4556>scab<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>much<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he has been <S%H7200>seen<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing,<s%> he shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H8145>again.<s%>

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4556>scab<s%> <S%H6581>spreads<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> it is a <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>
<S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> is in a <S%H120>man,<s%> then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> him: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H7613>rising<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and it have <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and there be <S%H4241>quick<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H7613>rising;<s%>

It is an <S%H3462>old<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and shall not <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up: for he is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H6524>break<s%> out <S%H6524>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of him that has the <S%H5061>plague<s%> from his <S%H7218>head<s%> even to his <S%H7272>foot,<s%> <S%H3605>wherever<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4758>looks;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>consider:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> have <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> he shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> that has the <S%H5061>plague:<s%> it is <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white:<s%> he is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
But <S%H3117>when<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7200>appears<s%> in him, he shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and pronounce him to be <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> for the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean:<s%> it is a <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and be <S%H2015>changed<s%> to <S%H3836>white,<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> him: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H3836>white;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> that has the <S%H5061>plague:<s%> he is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
The <S%H1320>flesh<s%> also, in which, even in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> thereof, was a <S%H7822>boil,<s%> and is <S%H7495>healed,<s%>

And in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7822>boil<s%> there be a <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H7613>rising,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot,<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and somewhat <S%H125>reddish,<s%> and it be <S%H7200>showed<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

And if, when the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> it, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H8217>lower<s%> than the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> thereof be <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> it is a <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H6524>broken<s%> out of the <S%H7822>boil.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on it, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H8181>hairs<s%> therein, and <S%H518>if<s%> it be not <S%H8217>lower<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> but be <S%H3544>somewhat<s%> <S%H3544>dark;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>much<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> it is a <S%H5061>plague.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> in his place, and <S%H6581>spread<s%> not, it is a <S%H6867>burning<s%> <S%H7822>boil;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> there be any <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> whereof there is a <S%H784>hot<s%> <S%H4348>burning,<s%> and the <S%H4241>quick<s%> flesh that <S%H4348>burns<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot,<s%> somewhat <S%H125>reddish,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on it: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot<s%> be <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and it be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> it is a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H6524>broken<s%> out of the <S%H4348>burning:<s%> why the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

But if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on it, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot,<s%> and it be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8217>lower<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the other <S%H5785>skin,<s%> but be <S%H3544>somewhat<s%> <S%H3544>dark;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> him up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> it be <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>much<s%> <S%H6581>abroad<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> it is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> in his <S%H8478>place,<s%> and <S%H6581>spread<s%> not in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> but it be <S%H3544>somewhat<s%> <S%H3544>dark;<s%> it is a <S%H7613>rising<s%> of the <S%H4348>burning,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean:<s%> for it is an <S%H6867>inflammation<s%> of the <S%H4348>burning.<s%>
<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H5061>plague<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H2206>beard;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5061>plague:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> it be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> and there be in it a <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H8181>hair;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> it is a <S%H5424>dry<s%> <S%H5424>scale,<s%> even a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2206>beard.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of the <S%H5424>scale,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it be not in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and that there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> in it; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> up him that has the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of the <S%H5424>scale<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%>

And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5424>scale<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> not, and there be in it <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair,<s%> and the <S%H5424>scale<s%> be not in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin;<s%>

He shall be <S%H1548>shaven,<s%> but the <S%H5424>scale<s%> shall he not <S%H1548>shave;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> up him that has the <S%H5424>scale<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8145>more:<s%>

And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5424>scale:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5424>scale<s%> be not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> nor be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean:<s%> and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>
But <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H5424>scale<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H6581>much<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H2893>cleansing;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on him: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5424>scale<s%> be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall not <S%H1239>seek<s%> for <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair;<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5424>scale<s%> be in his <S%H5869>sight<s%> at a <S%H5975>stay,<s%> and that there is <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> <S%H6779>grown<s%> up therein; the <S%H5424>scale<s%> is <S%H7495>healed,<s%> he is <S%H2889>clean:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

If a <S%H376>man<s%> also <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spots,<s%> even <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spots;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spots<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be <S%H3544>darkish<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> it is a <S%H933>freckled<s%> <S%H933>spot<s%> that <S%H6524>grows<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> he is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3588>whose<s%> <S%H4803>hair<s%> is <S%H4803>fallen<s%> off his <S%H7218>head,<s%> he is <S%H7142>bald;<s%> yet is he <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

And he that has his <S%H4803>hair<s%> <S%H4803>fallen<s%> off from the part of his <S%H7218>head<s%> toward his <S%H6440>face,<s%> he is <S%H1371>forehead<s%> <S%H1371>bald:<s%> yet is he <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> there be in the <S%H7146>bald<s%> head, <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1372>bald<s%> <S%H1372>forehead,<s%> a <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H125>reddish<s%> <S%H5061>sore;<s%> it is a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H6524>sprung<s%> up in his <S%H7146>bald<s%> head, <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H1372>bald<s%> <S%H1372>forehead.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on it: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H7613>rising<s%> of the <S%H5061>sore<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H125>reddish<s%> in his <S%H7146>bald<s%> head, <S%H176>or<s%> in his <S%H1372>bald<s%> <S%H1372>forehead,<s%> as the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H4758>appears<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh;<s%>

He is a <S%H6879>leprous<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean:<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him utterly <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> his <S%H5061>plague<s%> is in his <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And the <S%H6879>leper<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is, his <S%H899>clothes<s%> shall be <S%H6533>rent,<s%> and his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H6544>bore,<s%> and he shall put a <S%H5844>covering<s%> on his <S%H8222>upper<s%> <S%H8222>lip,<s%> and shall <S%H7121>cry,<s%> <S%H2931>Unclean,<s%> <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> shall be in him he shall be <S%H2930>defiled;<s%> he is <S%H2931>unclean:<s%> he shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H909>alone;<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> shall his <S%H4186>habitation<s%> be.

The <S%H899>garment<s%> also that the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> is in, whether it be a <S%H6785>woolen<s%> <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H899>garment;<s%>

<S%H176>Whether<s%> it be in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6154>woof;<s%> of <S%H6593>linen,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of <S%H6785>woolen;<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> in a <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>thing<s%> <S%H4399>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skin;<s%>

And if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H3422>greenish<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H125>reddish<s%> in the <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H176>either<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin;<s%> it is a <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> and shall be <S%H7200>showed<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest:<s%>
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> up it that has the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%>

And he shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H176>either<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in a <S%H5785>skin,<s%> or in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> that is <S%H6213>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skin;<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is a <S%H3992>fretting<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy;<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

He shall therefore <S%H8313>burn<s%> that <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> <S%H8359>warp<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6154>woof,<s%> in <S%H6785>woolen<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H6593>linen,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is: for it is a <S%H3992>fretting<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy;<s%> it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be not <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H176>either<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> that they <S%H3526>wash<s%> the thing <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is, and he shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> it up <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8145>more:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H5061>plague,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that it is <S%H3526>washed:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> have not <S%H2015>changed<s%> his <S%H5869>color,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be not <S%H6581>spread;<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it in the <S%H784>fire;<s%> it is <S%H6356>fret<s%> inward, whether it be <S%H7146>bore<s%> <S%H7146>within<s%> or <S%H1372>without.<s%>

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>look,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H3544>somewhat<s%> <S%H3544>dark<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3526>washing<s%> of it; then he shall <S%H7167>rend<s%> it out of the <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> out of the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> out of the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> out of the <S%H6154>woof:<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> in the <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H176>either<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in the <S%H6154>woof,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin;<s%> it is a <S%H6524>spreading<s%> plague: you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> that <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And the <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H176>either<s%> <S%H8359>warp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6154>woof,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%> it be, <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3526>wash,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H5493>departed<s%> from them, then it shall be <S%H3526>washed<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, and shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in a <S%H899>garment<s%> of <S%H6785>woolen<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6593>linen,<s%> <S%H176>either<s%> in the <S%H8359>warp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6154>woof,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>thing<s%> of <S%H5785>skins,<s%> to pronounce it <S%H2891>clean,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to pronounce it <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>
